alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Newton; Pope (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 3:57PM CDT until April 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Newton County in north central Arkansas... Johnson County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Pope County in central Arkansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 357 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Cass to near Altus, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Lamar... Hartman... Dillen... Woodland... Hinkle... Devils Knob... Hoyt... Walnut... Spadra... Bertha... Holman... Rosetta... Coal Hill... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Catalpa... Fort Douglas... Yale... Lutherville... Long Pool Campground... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
